titleStmt.title: A copy of a letter from the French king to King James in answer to one from him. Translated from the French copy.
titleStmt.author: Louis XIV, King of France, 1638-1715.
James II, King of England 1633-1701.

notesStmt.note: Dated and signed at end: From our camp before Namur, June the 18. 1692. Lewis.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
